name: Labyrinth Quest
description:
Overview

The country of Gallant has reopened their ancient Labyrinth, shutting off all immigration and emigration. Now, you must travel with your guide, Rodney Malone,  to solve the mysteries of the Labyrinth. Get through different obstacles, battle enemies and bosses, and solve puzzles to get to the end and save the country of Gallant from a tyrannical ruler, and allow your friend to see his family again. 

Features
  • Solve a variety of different obstacles and puzzles
  • Play story mode or treasure mode
  • Complete 75 levels
  • 5 different areas, each with their own obstacles, enemies, items, and effects!
  • 5 boss battles
  • Battle different enemies with an array of different weapons
  • Collect interesting treasures
  • A full level editor, to create your own levels
  • Great soundtrack adopted from Eric Matyas
  • Configurable controls
Credits

Programmed by Daniel Gaull (Duoplus Software)

Sound Effects from freesound.org
